name: Red-Eyes Dragon Knight
text: While this card is on the field, it is also treated as a Dragon type. Once per turn: You can equip 1 Dragon monster you control to this card, except "Red-Eyes Dragon Knight" (max. 1). If this card would be destroyed, send the equipped monster to the GY instead. If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 Warrior type monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Red-Eyes Dragon Knight" once per turn.
